javadoc:
A {@link SettingsDefinition} implementation that uses a real java {@link Enum}.
@param <T> java Enum that defines the possible values to store.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: settingName
params.comment: String that specifies how this setting is stored

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
Enum instance that will be returned when this SettingsDefinition
 has not been specified yet.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the Enum instance that is the default Enum for this {@link SettingsDefinition}.
@return Enum
methods.name: getDefaultEnum
methods.comment: Returns the Enum instance that is the default Enum for this SettingsDefinition.

methods.name: getEnumValue
methods.comment:
Returns an enum instance that corresponds to the setting stored, or the
 #getDefaultEnum() if the setting has not been assigned yet.

params.name: settings
params.comment: Settings object that stores the settings values.

return.comment: EnumT value, or #getDefaultEnum() if not present.

methods.name: getEnumValue
methods.comment:
Returns an enum instance that corresponds to the setting stored, or the
 a custom default value if the setting has not been assigned yet.

params.name: settings
params.comment: Settings object that stores the settings values.

return.comment: EnumT value, or the specified defaultValueOveride if not present.

methods.name: setEnumValue
methods.comment:
Sets the value of this SettingsDefinition using the ordinal of the specified
 enum.

methods.name: getEnumByOrdinal
methods.comment: Returns the Enum instance that corresponds to the specified ordinal value.

params.name: ordinal
params.comment: integer that corresponds to an Enum.

methods.name: getOrdinalByString
methods.comment: returns the Enum's ordinal using the Enum's string representation.

methods.javadoc:
The name of this setting as it is stored in a {@link Settings} object.
@return String name.
methods.name: getSettingName
methods.comment: The name of this setting as it is stored in a Settings object.

name: JavaEnumSettingsDefinition
comment: A SettingsDefinition implementation that uses a real java Enum.
